mapper.update: update tb_consumer t set t.name =#{name}, t.phone=#{phone}, t.nick_name =#{nickName}, t.img = #{img}, t.province =#{province}, t.city =#{city} where t.id=#{userid}
update tb_consumer_log t set t.login_name=#{livePhone}, t.live_phone =#{city}, t.nick_name=#{nickName}, t.sex=#{sex} where t.user_id=#{userid}
